channel.title: Deep Learning on Zuzanna Deutschman
channel.description: Recent content in Deep Learning on Zuzanna Deutschman

item.title: Predict The Office character with TwoModalBERT
item.description: Introduction Have you ever dealt with a case when there were multiple text features in your dataset? For example, your task could be to properly classify a message given its context, understood as the previous message. Let’s consider whether we want to classify the below sample as positive or negative. context message This product is horrible, which I didn’t expect. Its website is just incredible! When only the message is considered, you can see its sentiment is positive due to the word ‘incredible’.

item.title: Replicate your friend with Transformer
item.description: This article was written for Chatbot’s Life. It is a tutorial in which a chatbot based on a conversation from Messenger is created from scratch using TensorFlow.
